name: wargreycolorscheme
summary: Dark color scheme for terminal with full options
description:
I like to use vim in the terminal rather than with GUI front-end. So this plugin is only used in terminal and all the GUI settings are the same as the cterm.

BTW:Let the terminal background transparent. You will feel more comfortable.

Screenshots：http://wargrey.yo2.cn/2009/04/05/25586/
(Maybe you should save them to local to view the full version)
install_details: Just throw it into the colors directory in your runtimepath.
